directions: Cream together butter and sugar.  Add eggs and vanilla.  mix well.  Mix dry ingredients together. Add to egg mixture.  Mix well.  Add chopped up Babe Ruth Candy bars.
Drop by heaping teaspoonful on cookie sheet.   Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12-15 minutes.
ingredients: 2 mini chocolate-coated peanut and nougat candy, eg: Baby Ruth TM
title: Baby Ruth Cookies
